channel.title: mechkeebs on Heikki Stark
channel.description: Recent content in mechkeebs on Heikki Stark

item.title: 50th keyboard - Giveaway
item.description: ** GIVEAWAY IS OVER ** I built my first custom mechanical keyboard 19th of August, 2019. never would I have thought that I’d ever build 50 of them. It’s been crazy and feels unbelievable. The 50th keyboard is going to be a special one. I am giving it away in my Twitch channel! The 50th keyboard I decided to go with a SixtyFive keyboard by Mode Designs. The SixtyFive keyboard (also known as Mode65) is a highly configurable keyboard with a 65% layout.

item.title: LogiMech
item.description: Prologue Logitech Extreme 3D Pro is a legendary joystick/flightstick, however you want to say it. It was released in 2003 and it is still in production and sold for around 50€. You can get these for cheap. The joystick itself is really basic, but gives you a good variety of buttons and features for a small price. Even if the name gives you a small hint, that there might be a casual version of the joystick, but on the contrary, there isn’t.

item.title: Keyboards by Heikki
item.description: Browse my previous commission keyboards and find more information on how you can order a custom keyboard!

item.title: Keyboard portfolio
item.description: Recently I’ve been gettting a lot of requests and questions about mechanical keyboards. Mostly because of this one video. For this video, I want to give a short shoutout to Ville Erkkilä and Kiehu Creative for coming up with the idea and filming the amazing video. This whole video was shot on my old apartment, in a quite smallish place and didn’t even take that long to shoot! Altogether it was a fun evening with keebs and cameras and friends.
